messages.messageBody:
Ren wrote:
>I am SO happy for all of you. Everytime I read about her, I get tears
in my eyes. I have to say, I'm kinda hoping she likes makeup.;) <

Yeah, well, I suspect that will very likely be the case. She's pretty darn
girly.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Our little girl
messages.msgSnippet: ~We have  been getting to know each other (learning each other), and she will be coming  home to live the weekend after this one.  Her room is ready and
messages.messageBody:
~We have been getting to know each other (learning each other), and she
will be coming home to live the weekend after this one. Her room is
ready and gorgeous, and we are very excited.
Two other pieces of good news: First, we are cleared to bring her to
Albuquerque for the Live and Learn conference. And best of all, we
are approved to homeschool from the very beginning.~

I am SO happy for all of you. Everytime I read about her, I get tears
in my eyes. I have to say, I'm kinda hoping she likes makeup.;)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
